Params: {1: '"All units KIA except for ■■■. Commandant Ravenge has defected to the Ascendants."', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1', 7: '-4', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Those grim words flash in crimson on the mission briefing screen.'}
{3: 'Below, in the more discreet section, there\'s a comprehensive record of how often the frontline units have been in contact with this so-called "Ascension-Network".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: '...Letting a desertion this severe happen in the first place is a glaring dereliction of duty by the military.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The officer in a sharp suit is the first to break the silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Don't blame yourself too much. If a soldier on the front line can't resist temptation, then both the duty—and the fallout—lie on his shoulders alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And the intel we gather from the war-torn fallen is instrumental in refining our Construct research and development.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Identify the new threat and stay prepared. Their sacrifice must not be in vain.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A true leader is someone who never loses sight of what lies ahead. Still, no matter how composed the words, they won't simply erase a military commander's concerns."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: '"Only by standing alongside the Ascendant who holds sway over the Punishing Virus can humanity hope for a future." This statement was recovered from the audio logs found on our squad member, Hiro.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Up to now, we've mainly encountered Corrupted with minimal cognitive capacity...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If this intel is accurate, it means the enemies who seek to wield the Punishing Virus's power—now operating in organized cells—are growing more active.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We're all aware that, compared to a single commandant's defection or the loss of one Construct, this is a far graver turn of events.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's why I advocate tackling the issue at its source.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Use the combat logs to study the Ascendant's moves—then we lure in our biggest catch.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Besides, there's a chance practically falling into my lap at this very moment.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What do you think?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Ever heard of a place called Las Prados?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: 'Desert', 2: 'Outskirts of Las Prados', 4: 'A few days ago.'}
{3: 'A few days ago, desert, outskirts of Las Prados'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Contact. The target is on the move—all units, stand by.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sensing an anomaly on their instruments, the Construct squad leader quietly issues orders to the teammates on either side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Copy that. Target location confirmed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His unruly streak doesn\'t fade, even in the midst of an operation—taking orders from a so-called "rookie" is about as far as he\'s willing to go.'}
{3: "Still, Discord's exceptional skills are enough to impress absolutely anyone."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Issarius, stay alert for any Corrupted movements. Daemon, the moment I open fire, move in and lock them down.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Wind speed is holding at 13.9 meters per second. A sandstorm will hit the mission zone in thirty minutes. Infrared scans are still running—no additional hostiles detected beyond our primary target.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: 'The restraint gear for the target is set and ready.', 4: '3'}
{3: "A brief flicker of doubt crosses Discord's eyes—unusual for someone so composed—but she quickly reins in the surge of emotion swirling through her M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'All right—everyone, move into combat positions.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the vast desert sands, the stumbling Construct singled out as the target remains oblivious to its looming fate.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Ch-choose me... give me another chance...', 4: '18'}
{2: '???', 3: "I... I still... can... this body... isn't... everything...", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'The target appears partially aware—its Memory not yet fully consumed by the virus.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though the guarding Construct keeps its guard up, it still acknowledges the undeniable truth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Daemon', 3: "Oh? So you're thinking of having a word with him? Trying to convince him to return with us of his own free will?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Boss, do we still proceed with lethal force?', 4: '1'}
{3: "He pays no heed to his teammate's remark and turns straight to Discord with a proposal."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "I'll ensure the target is fully disabled. Our assignment is to confirm the identity of that unidentified Construct that's been lurking around. Command hasn't ordered us to neutralize it—just to verify.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She fine-tunes the electronic scope on her precision sniper rifle, works the bolt, and chambers a fin-stabilized armor-piercing round.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Roger that.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiAreaWarHangUp/FxUiAreaWarHangUpBg01.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Discord raises her rifle, locking onto the solitary Construct who trudges on through the howling sand.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiAreaWarHangUp/FxUiAreaWarHangUpBg01.prefab', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: "The deafening blast—like a tank's main cannon—erupts behind the rocks concealing the squad, flames licking the air. A brilliant flash of silver slices through the haze of dust and rubble."}
{3: "Before the two Construct allies can even register what's happening, the target's left leg is blown apart, sending him crashing to the ground in hopeless defeat."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '...Daemon, subdue the target.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her weapon as though nothing has happened. The mask conceals her face, leaving only those cold, unblinking eyes to assert her undeniable authority.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Daemon', 3: 'Leave it to me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Acting on the order, the Construct scales the rocks and races toward the fallen remains of its comrade.'}
{3: 'He squeezes the trigger twice on his launcher, then locks the target down with a crackling electric restraint.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'The sandstorm is set to hit the mission zone in twenty-eight minutes. No trace of Corrupted activity so far.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discord nods once in acknowledgment, guiding the rear-guard teammates as they close in around the target.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Which fireteam are you with...?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Daemon', 3: "Purifying Force. You can't see our insignia?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "If you want to stay alive, start talking. If our leader's feeling generous, you might just walk away with your life.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Sure, Discord's secrecy can be off-putting, but it's Daemon's nonstop chatter that truly grates on everyone's nerves."}
{3: 'He always seems to find one more thing to gripe about.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Fireteam? What's that supposed to mean?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Wait—you're not the retrieval team from Monzano?", 4: '18'}
{3: "This time, even Daemon spots the leader's momentary slip. For those tense few seconds, she makes no response whatsoever."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Or... maybe you've come to take me out...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "No big deal! I'm not about to trust some phony Memory-transfer scam!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I... I've seen the Network's revelation! We are immortal!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Arcs of blue light dance across the Construct's mangled frame, sending sparks every which way. Still, it lets out a wild, nonsensical howl—as though it couldn't be more excited."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Who's Monzano?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Still bound by her duties, she fires off her question in that quick, clipped way she's known for."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Captain Eleanor left me behind—are you all going to be just as heartless?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Quit the act... you fool! You're just a mindless puppet that only knows how to follow orders! I am eternal!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Taking back Earth—what a lie! The network chose me! I was this close—this close to... to...!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "The ravaged Construct thrashes, its sensors glowing red like a predator's savage, bloodshot eyes."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Stay alert! The Punishing Virus inside the target is spiking at an alarming rate!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discord ignores everything else. She closes in, her voice brimming with that same crushing intensity as she interrogates the target.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Eleanor? She's been gone for years.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Monzano's right-hand person—the lead commandant of the Construct Corps. No way you haven't heard of her!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '0.6'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '5'}
{1: '1', 3: "An inexplicable weightlessness grips Discord's mind, as though her very sanity is plunging into a bottomless void."}
{3: 'But obedience to orders practically defines her entire mental framework. She must complete the mission.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'And what of the other Ascendants? Have you pinpointed their targets? Speak—now!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "You really think I'm an Ascendant? I'm hardly worthy of such a title!", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Eleanor abandoned me—and my entire squad—in that godforsaken pit. It was the Network that brought me back from the brink!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'It jump-started my vital fluids, fortified my body... and showed me things I never dreamed possible...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'A planet completely consumed by the Punishing Virus—crimson, decaying, flourishing, utterly majestic!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He seems lost in a daze, leaving his weapon silent—no new arcs to seize control of his target.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'The contamination is about to breach its critical limit! The sandstorm will descend in 20 minutes!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The sole sane Construct issues a warning no one can afford to ignore.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Send us your original retrieval coordinates. We'll bring you back.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Go back? Why on earth would we return?! That so-called garden is doomed to bloom with toxic flowers sooner or later!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I let the Network down once—never again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Spent electro-javelins crash to the ground and vanish into the swirling sand. The target breaks free from the arcs' grip."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg'}
{3: 'She instinctively orders her squad to drop down, but two abrupt gunshot blasts ring in her ears.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{3: 'The Construct charges at her, only to have its head blown clean through. A second bullet shatters the metal shell, sending fragments flying in every direction.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'I had no choice—I had to use lethal force.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shooter reloads, offering a terse justification for pulling the trigger.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "You're remarkably quick to respond.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Though she's out of immediate danger, the terror and chaos echoing in her mind threaten to rob her of breath."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Gather the target's data chip and get ready to leave. Daemon, call for transport.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct standing nearby offers no reply.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Daemon? Sandstorm's closing in—we have to pull out, now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: 'Constructs... If there were a way to live as humans do, who would ever choose to become something like this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He quietly laments to himself, then opens the comm channel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Cut the chatter and stay on your guard.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Unmoved by her teammates' bickering, Discord deftly turns over the shattered Construct and retrieves its data chip."}
{1: '<size=40>Universal Enhancement Frame</size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory951.png', 6: '1', 7: '-2', 10: '1'}
{1: '<size=40>Snow Ferret Fireteam</size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory951.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: '<size=40>Ferret-2</size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory951.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'The inscription on the chip looks unfamiliar, but what truly shatters her composure is the manufacturing label at the bottom.'}
{1: '[Eden III Colony Ship, Construct R&D Department.]', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: '[Eden III Colony Ship, Construct R&D Department.]'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1169.jpg'}
{3: "It's a lost legend of the Golden Age—something that should have faded into the depths of time long ago."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.6'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'This <color=#ff4e4eff>nightmare</color> haunts her from before she ever received her mechanical frame.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'This nightmare haunts her from before she ever received her mechanical frame.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: 'Mission Briefing Room', 2: 'Two hours later'}
{3: 'Two hours later, Mission Briefing Room'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '...That covers the entire mission report. The retrieved data chip has been backed up and handed off to the Science Council.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The moment she steps off the transport plane, she barely has time to check her ammo or assess the battle damage before Collins's message arrives, demanding a report."}
{3: 'When Gray Raven Commandant Ravenge contacts the Ascension-Network and defects, what was once dismissed as mere rumor instantly becomes the primary concern of both Kurono and the military.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: "So you're telling me the target handed over the original retrieval coordinates? Let's have the exact location details.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "If the target's intel holds up, they would've headed to the New Neilis Air Force Base on the outskirts to evacuate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'You mean the old air force base? That godforsaken dump has been left to rot for ages...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "One thing is certain: they're definitely not from Babylonia. Also, Monzano is officially listed as missing.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Discord cuts the man off mid-sentence, and Collins understands all too well what's fueling her outburst."}

{2: 'Collins', 3: "Oh, that reminds me... Guess hooking up to the Ascension-Network scrambled his mind, huh? Because if he's telling the truth, all your old buddies are still alive and kicking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "...I'm submitting a request to investigate Las Prados.", 4: '2'}
{3: "She's suddenly sick of humoring the higher-ups' bluster. Maybe for the first time, she states exactly what she wants."}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Don't rush; we'll get there soon enough. But remember—you're part of the army's official Purifying Force, not some private hire from Kurono.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Given the recent stir in the Ascension-Network, we've just joined forces with the Arctic Route Union to advance Project Winter to its next phase.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'And it looks like the Parliament is every bit as invested in the Ascension-Network as we are...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Las Prados is already a wasteland. Whatever tricks Monzano might pull, it won't be enough to cause real trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "We'll use that as our bait, convincing the military to launch an official investigation—and along the way, we can eliminate Monzano.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Any intel they gather there should align perfectly with Palangoski's previous statements.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "This confirms once again that the previous experiments have ended, and Monzano's actions no longer have anything to do with Kurono.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'Project Winter can continue without a hitch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'Regarding that "Eden III" you mentioned, I\'ll pass the details along to my bro Liszt—this kind of thing is right up his alley.', 4: '1'}
{3: "He senses that Kurono is poised on the very brink of the Ascension-Network—the idea of taking that leap has him so exhilarated he's on the verge of tears."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: 'If he can wield that sort of power... then every sacrifice so far will have been worth it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man seems utterly lost in his own fevered fantasies.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '...I have to learn the truth.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She shows no reaction to his attempts at provocation.'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "We'll get the answers we're after—every last one. And for that, I should thank you, little one...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Collins', 3: "We all assumed your old contact had been dead for ages. Who would've thought that, after all this time, she'd be the one to open a door for Kurono? Whatever Monzano's up to now, her creation has already caught the eye of the Ascension-Network...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'Twists and turns—so many twists and turns! After all this time, our hard work finally bears fruit in the most unexpected way!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He clears his throat, pulls out a pouch of chewing tobacco, and pops it into his mouth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: "Go get some rest, hero—you've earned it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'She throws the man a frosty glare, then pivots on her heel and strides back into the hallway.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg'}

{3: 'Beyond the porthole, the stars never cease their glow—not even when a tiny planet in the far reaches of the Orion Arm finds its civilization stalled by catastrophe. They shine on, radiant and timeless, forever breathtaking.'}
{3: 'And so they wait—patiently letting their light journey across countless millennia, only to be glimpsed at last by mortal eyes.'}
{3: "But from Discord's perspective, for the first time, those distant stars seem strangely unreal."}
{3: "It's like a meticulously orchestrated light show, flaring on cue and then winking out in perfect unison."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory58.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "And there are new stars—ones you'd never catch a glimpse of from down here."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg'}
{3: "She recalls that plea, now so distant it's as if someone else entirely had spoken it."}
{3: "The stars keep drifting slowly, a trick of the eye caused by the giant ship's rotation beneath her feet."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'For the first time, the view beyond the porthole makes her head spin.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '0', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia Conference Room', 2: 'Now'}
{3: 'Now, Babylonia Conference Room'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Las Prados—once the shining City of Entertainment of the Golden Age. It's where Kurono previously conducted studies on starship ecosystem reliability.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Kurono invited us to investigate? From what you've told me, they've got more than a few secrets hidden out there.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Las Prados is seeing a sharp rise in Punishing activity these days. Just a few days ago, the Purifying Force subdued a suspicious Construct and returned with its data chip.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Collins is probably fully aware of his actions. For all we know, Kurono might be intentionally letting this secret slip right under our noses.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He takes a moment to reflect, then the leader delivers his verdict.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Are we talking about the retrieval operation led by Discord? How far has the Science Council gotten with their analysis?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's the biggest question in this whole affair. Even if we exclude the possibility that the target Construct ever linked to the Ascension-Network, its M.I.N.D. model still doesn't match those of Babylonia's Constructs...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The only frame with a similar pattern is the so-called "Poster Hero", whose origin remains unknown.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What do you mean...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...You remember that drifter Construct—the one who claimed it could transmit its own Memory and carried a hidden Inver-Device? We briefly had them in our ranks.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The atmosphere is so tense. No one anticipated that this discussion would stray into such disruptive intel from outside the Ascension-Network.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Honestly, I think the military should put an end to this entire propaganda effort.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The President exhales quietly, a trace of resignation in his voice.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "From the start, we have no idea where he truly comes from... we've only ever seen him as a miracle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Yet the moment you try to exploit a miracle, it loses the very essence that made it one.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: "For the most part, this isn't mine to decide. Now that the rumors are out, the soldiers cling to this so-called miracle. I can't bring myself to rob them of the hope that keeps them going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Besides, any sermon can wait until after we've won.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The commanding officer seems eager to jump into the fray.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...If we can unravel this secret with our own hands, maybe that manufactured myth will crumble on its own.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Learning more about the Ascension-Network and winning a ground-level battle—this hope outweighs any legend told on the front lines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll handle the Parliament's affairs. The battle plan is all yours.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola offers a ceremonial salute, then strides out of the conference room.'}

{3: "During his talk with Nikola just moments ago, he feigned ignorance of that city's name. And for a leader constantly juggling countless responsibilities, being unfamiliar with a city devoted to leisure seems only logical."}
{3: 'Yet the truth is, his ties to that name stretch back a very long time.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'The Acadia Evacuation'}
{3: 'Era of the Acadia Evacuation, Babylonia'}
{3: 'A narrow seam opens along the sleek fuselage, and the compact landing gear settles onto the platform without so much as a whisper.'}
{3: "It's nothing like the heavy, clunky military transport planes still in service."}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'This is the final sortie of the day. Each battlefront has stabilized enough to endure until the staged withdrawal concludes.'}
{3: "He doesn't expect to be greeted by someone of such high standing, but he still delivers his report with meticulous care."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You must be exhausted. Take a good break, okay?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Passengers file out of the transport plane one by one, marveling at the sprawling hangar of Babylonia—though it might be more a burst of relief at having made it through in one piece.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hassen steps onto the platform, taking a slow, measured walk around the fuselage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Flight Crew', 3: 'Um... Oh! Mr. Hassen! I mean—uh, not "Mister"—I, I...', 4: '2'}
{3: "The maintenance worker, in the middle of servicing the aircraft, spots a face they've only ever glimpsed on the news and suddenly doesn't know where to put their hands or feet."}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'No worries—take it easy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "This model really is rare. It's more advanced than the military transports we usually use.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Flight Crew', 3: "Oh, uh, there's nothing advanced about it. It's just a civilian jet from the City of Entertainment—looks fancy, sure, but it's squishy! Can't even take one hit!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Surprisingly, the big shot starts talking about something he's totally in his element with, and he slips right into the conversation."}
{2: 'Flight Crew', 3: "Still, it works. At a time like this, as long as it can get airborne, that's all that really counts.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Flight Crew', 3: "That previous President is a real scumbag. Even in the thick of an emergency, he's still angling for bribes!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Flight Crew', 3: "If not for your efforts, we'd never have secured such precious transport resources!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The workers respond with genuine enthusiasm, and Hassen senses their heartfelt gratitude.'}
{3: 'Sadly, some stories are fated to rest forever with those who lived them, never to be passed on.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '...I wonder who was behind the construction of these transport planes...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Flight Crew', 3: "That, I couldn't tell you. But one thing's for sure—the rich sure know how to flaunt it. All this fuss for a single city, and they've got entire fleets of aerospace transports on standby...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Hassen runs his hand over the smooth heat-shield plating, as if it's some marvel from a world beyond this one."}
{3: 'The hastily painted World Government emblem stands out starkly against the white hull, while the faded word "Las Prados" still lingers underneath.'}
